pageContext.claim: “Rasmussen and others have my approval ratings at around 50%, which is higher than Obama, and yet the political pundits love saying my approval ratings are “somewhat low.” They know they are lying when they say it. Turn off the show - FAKE NEWS!”
pageContext.analysis: According to a calculation of the president's approval rating by Fivethirtyeight, which accounts for each poll's quality, recency, sample size and partisan lean, on March 11, Trump had a 40.7% approval rating, which is lower than Barack Obama's (48.6%) at the same point in his first term.
